availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: John Halbrook (Graves County, KY, farmer and minister)

body.p: Graves County, Kentucky, farmer and minister. North Carolina native. Married to Elizabeth New Halbrook in Stokes County, North Carolina, on June 17, 1811. Father of Martha Halbrook and Freeman Halbrook. Farmer in Graves County, Kentucky, in 1850. Minister in Graves County in 1860.

ab.bibl:
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Graves County, District 2, p. 370A.
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Graves County, p. 45.
North Carolina County Registers of Deeds, North Carolina State Archives, Raleigh, NC, RG 048, Stokes County Marriage Bonds - Abstracts (1790-1870), p. 123.
